to
{{ card.title }}
{{ card.value }}
{{ card.change >= 0 ? '+' : '' }}{{ card.change }}%

Channel Performance

import { Component, OnInit, ChangeDetectionStrategy } from '@angular/core'; import { DashboardDataService } from '../../services/dashboard-data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.scss'], changeDetection: ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { channelData: any; engagementMetrics: any; budgetMetrics: any; campaignEvents: any; errorMessage: string = ''; startDate: string = ''; endDate: string = ''; maxDate: string = ''; kpiCards = [ { title: 'Total Revenue', value: '$1.2M', change: 5.4 }, { title: 'Campaign ROI', value: '350%', change: 3.2 }, { title: 'Messages Sent', value: '1.5M', change: -1.1 }, { title: 'Avg Conversion Rate', value: '4.5%', change: 0.8 } ]; constructor(private dashboardService: DashboardDataService) {} ngOnInit() { try { this.channelData = this.dashboardService.getChannelPerformance(); this.engagementMetrics = this.dashboardService.getEngagementMetrics(); this.budgetMetrics = this.dashboardService.getBudgetMetrics(); this.campaignEvents = this.dashboardService.getCampaignEvents(); // Initialize date range to last 7 days const today = new Date(); this.maxDate = today.toISOString().split('T')[0]; const priorDate = new Date().setDate(today.getDate() - 7); this.startDate = new Date(priorDate).toISOString().split('T')[0]; this.endDate = this.maxDate; } catch (error) { this.errorMessage = 'An error occurred while loading dashboard data.'; console.error(error); } } onDateChange() { // Validate date range max 15 days if (this.startDate && this.endDate) { const start = new Date(this.startDate); const end = new Date(this.endDate); const diffTime = Math.abs(end.getTime() - start.getTime()); const diffDays = diffTime / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24); if (diffDays > 15) { alert('Date range cannot exceed 15 days.'); // Reset endDate to startDate + 15 days or today const maxEnd = new Date(start); maxEnd.setDate(start.getDate() + 15); this.endDate = maxEnd > new Date() ? new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] : maxEnd.toISOString().split('T')[0]; } } // TODO: Refresh data based on new date range } createCampaign() { alert('Create Campaign button clicked!'); // TODO: Implement create campaign functionality } }
